message.body: How are you holding up in this cold?
Hey. Yeah. I'm good. It's much warmer today and the sun is out!! Wow Ingrid must be a 4 or 5 months? Crazy.
I think four! Yeah today is better. We miss you here!
I was afraid I had scared you away last time we talked.
Lol...No. Things were just crazy last weekend with my dad and deadlines and teaching.
ok good. i completely understand
And you have been busy and out of town
are you ok though
Yeah. I'm good! Looking forward to spring!
When do you leave?
i leave sat after class
but i am not going away again
and I’m back tuesday morning
Maybe we get together before you go. I'm excited for the ICA thing
bc i thought i had to teach gabi thing wed but he switched me to march 18th
me 2
i miss you so much
today i went for a run and its the first time I’ve felt normal in weeks
i think I’ve been a little crazy
Yeah. It's been weird the past few weeks. I have been doing work outs inky living room haha.
Do you want to go to clints lecture tomorrow??
We could grab a beer afterward
Or food
Ugg Sofie. Please know your smarter than these people you match yourself up to. Just keep going your doing just fine!! I also may have some more job leads for you!
Oh yeah. just read this. Me and Armen have been talking about setting up a date. But it’s hard bc he doesn’t live in boston.
Oh good! Well not all ooertunities will be walking distance from your apt! But it will work out!
I may have another contact for you.
hahahah. yes, of course. but i didn’t have the time to get out to suburbs this week.
Yeah! I know it's a haul with the train not working well on top of things.
Yes. It's getting better though.

wait i feel like you misunderstood me. I am really grateful for the introduction. I am not worried about getting out to the suburbs (bad transit or not .. bc i was going to rent a zipcar). we were trying to get together this week but nothing worked
sorry for the misunderstanding. i am poorly communicating bc my mom is jumping down my neck via email about nate (she is worried about me being with him).
